column6: company_profile
Smubu is a music streaming mobile app that enables users to play and download African music offline. The company was established in 2017 and is headquartered Nairobi, Kenya.
Chipper Cash is a financial technology company whose software offers cross-border instant money transfers in Africa. The company was established in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California, US.
Wangkang Group operates ceramic plants in Ghana, Nigeria, Tanzania and Uganda. The company is based in Foshan, China.

Route Mobile Limited is a global cloud communication platform service provider. Route Mobile Limited was formerly known as Routesms Solutions Limited and changed its name to Route Mobile Limited in March 2016. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Mumbai, India.
Mayfair Insurance is an insurance company. It was founded in 2005 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

ENGIE is a multinational electric utility firm. The company operates through five segments: GDF SUEZ Energy International; GDF SUEZ Energy Europe; GDF SUEZ Global Gas & LNG; GDF SUEZ Infrastructures; and GDF SUEZ Energy Services. ENGIE was formerly known as GDF SUEZ and rebranded in April 2015. The company was founded in 1880 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
column36: "Officially moving our headquarters to Uganda means even more of our employees will be close to our end customers. Uganda's inspiring 2030 vision focuses around the transformative power of new technologies and business development. The quality of the country's universities, the government's renewed focus on ease of doing business  and the support we have received from the government and President Museveni to date  make Uganda a fantastic, but often underestimated, place to do multinational business.  We know the wealth of talent, knowledge, and skill that can be found within the country. We also know that our Ugandan employees can offer these skills to Fenix teams in other countries." Lyndsay Handler, chief executive officer, Fenix International
column37: Eastern, Western and Southern Africa, as well as China and the United States

column6: Renew Strategies is an impact investment firm that manages and serves the Impact Angel Network, a global network of investors that seeks to make both social impact and financial returns on their investments in Africa. RENEW's largest office is in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, where it manages its investment operations. The RENEW team is made up of financial analysts, lawyers and business consultants with extensive experience in Africa. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
column36: Matthew Davis, chief executive officer, said, "Uganda is a country rich with opportunity."

column6: Marriott International operates, franchises, and licences hotels and corporate housing properties. The company's brandss include Ritz-Carlton and JW Marriott. Marriott International was established in 1927 and is headquartered in Bethesda, Maryland, US.

South Africa-based Shoprite operates as a consumer goods retailer. It engages in the retail sale of furniture, appliances, home entertainment products and floor coverings as well as food products. Shoprite was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in the Brackenfell area of Cape Town, South Africa.

UAE-based NMC Group, together with its subsidiaries, provides professional private sector medical services. The group also owns businesses engaged in a range of areas, including trading, hospitality, pharmaceutical manufacturing, pharmacy chains, financial services, education, jewellery, advertising, real estate and information technology. NMC Group was founded in 1975 and is based in Abu Dhabi, UAE.

Raxio Group is a data centre operator. It operates within the telecommunications sector and focuses on building and operating tier three data centres across markets in Africa. The company was established in 2018 and is headquartered in NYC, New York, US.

Diageo manufactures and distributes premium drinks. Its products include Scotch and Irish whiskey, gin, vodka, rum, and ready to drink products, as well as beer and spirits, Irish cream liqueur, Raki, wine, tequila, Canadian and American whiskey, adult beverages, CachaCa, and finishing centre products. The company's core brands include Johnnie Walker Red Label, Johnnie Walker Black Label, Crown Royal, Buchanan's, J&B, Baileys, Smirnoff, Captain Morgan, Guinness, Shui Jing Fang, and Yeni Raki. Its reserve brands comprise Johnnie Walker Blue Label, Johnnie Walker Green Label, Johnnie Walker Gold Label 18-year-old, Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve, Johnnie Walker Platinum Label 18-year-old, John Walker & Sons Collection, Johnnie Walker The Gold Route, Johnnie Walker The Royal Route, and other Johnnie Walker premium brands. The company operates in approximately 180 countries worldwide. Diageo was founded in 1886 and is based in London, UK.
Binance operates a global crypto-currency exchange platform. The company was established in 2017 and is based in Hong Kong.

UAE-based NMC Group, together with its subsidiaries, provides professional private sector medical services. The group also owns businesses engaged in a range of areas, including trading, hospitality, pharmaceutical manufacturing, pharmacy chains, financial services, education, jewellery, advertising, real estate and information technology. NMC Group was founded in 1975 and is based in Abu Dhabi, UAE.

Al Danube Building Materials manufactures and supplies building materials for customers in Gulf Cooperation Council countries, Asia, and Africa. It offers MDF, plywood, boards, exotic timber, veneer, laminates, cladding, steel, kitchen, sanitary, glass, hardware, electrical, aluminium, doors, flooring, adhesives, tiles, ceiling, paints, edge banding, and fire solution products. The company also designs and manufactures doors for interior and exterior applications. In addition, it offers matched door frame and door architrave with matched coating services. Al Danube Building Materials was founded in 1993 and is based in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.

column5: Societe Nationale des Chemins de Fer Francais (SNCF)
column6: Societe Nationale des Chemins de fer FranCais provides passenger and freight transportation services in France and internationally. It operates through five divisions: SNCF Infra, SNCF Proximites, SNCF Voyages, SNCF Logistics, and Gares & Connexions. The SNCF Infra division manages infrastructure, including network maintenance, projects, and operation for Reseau Ferre de France; and engineers rail infrastructure research and design. The SNCF Proximites division provides various local transport services, such as medium distance links, rail transport regulated services, city and intercity services, and bus, tramway, and subway services, as well as complementary services relating to passenger transport. The SNCF Voyages division offers passenger rail transport and distribution; and supplies services related to the transportation of passengers, such as sales and train management. The SNCF Logistics division is involved in a range of transport and freight logistics activities, such as logistics, freight forwarding, rail freight fleet management, and freight rail transport. The Gares & Connexions division develops and manages train stations in France. Societe Nationale des Chemins de fer FranCais is based in Paris, France, and was established in 1937.

South Africa-based Shoprite operates as a consumer goods retailer. It engages in the retail sale of furniture, appliances, home entertainment products and floor coverings as well as food products. Shoprite was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in the Brackenfell area of Cape Town, South Africa.

The Group's principal activities are the development, manufacture and distribution of digital mobile communication products, consumer electronic products and computer. Main products are the mobile phones, PHS, LCD TV, DVD player, amplifier, speaker, computer and peripheral device, notebook PC, flat panel TV and MP3 player. Other activities include the development and operation of real estate, exportation of self-produced and processing products, importation of technologies, equipment, raw materials and parts for Group production needs, processing imported materials, assembling imported parts, development and manufacture of office automation products and provision of after sale service for products.  The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

Express Shipping and Logistics (EA), together with its subsidiaries, operates as a third-party shipping and logistics service provider serving customers across sub-Saharan Africa. The company was established in 2001 and is headquartered in Mombasa, Kenya.

column5: Bionas Agropolitan Technology Corridor (BATC Development Bhd)
column6: Bionas Agropolitan Technology Corridor (BATC Development Bhd) produces bio-fuels. It products are; B20 Bio-Petrol (gasoline), M30 Bio-Petrol (gasoline), B10-B30 Bio-Diesel, Super Bio-Diesel, B25 Bio-Heavyfuel, Super Bio-Jetfuel, Bio-Booster Tablet, Bio-SuperLube Additive and Bio-Energy Emission Solution (BEES). The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Setapak, a suburb of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Diamond Trust Bank provides banking, insurance agency and other related services to the general public in east Africa. It offers current, savings and fixed deposit accounts. The company also provides credit and debit cards, electronic and mobile banking services and money transfer. In addition, it offers a wide variety of corporate banking services. Diamond Trust Bank was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Nairobi, Kenya.

African Media Agency (AMA) is a pan-African PR agency. Its portfolio of services media relations, monitoring, translation, consulting, events promotion, events organisation and production. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It has additional offices in Africa and the United States.
